Project Description 

Worked for a multinational manufacturing company that produces a variety of commercial and consumer 
products, engineering services, and aerospace systems for a wide variety of customers, from private 
consumers to major corporations and governments. Currently there are various sites that have data in Legacy 
systems and we need to extract data from these legacy systems , extract transform load in Informatica, 
cleanse the data by applying all the rules as per SAP standards and load them in SAP at the end. All the 
modifications of data are done as per the SAP standards and then using a SAP tool we load the data in SAP for 
end users. 

Responsibilities : 

- We load the data in SAP and hence we have all the Informatica Design as per the SAP modules. 
- Understand the mapping documents provided by the users and the rules to be implemented for the 

columns. 
- Data leads request for pulling the data from Legacy Systems and there starts our ETL part where  we 

acquire the data  and  then validate the  data  as  per  SAP rules  which are implemented in Informatica 

Data Quality Tool. 

Page 2 



- The validation report called Scorecard Report is then sent to the leads to verify how much of the data 
acquired is Valid to load in SAP and then approve the data to be loaded in SAP. 

- Responsible for loading all the objects of PS-CRM in SAP as per the requirements of Sites. 
- Identify the requirements and decide whether it can be worked out by enhancing the existing code or 

developing a new one. 
- Here in this project we have a validation process called – Scorecard which is a template build in 

Informatica Data Quality and which validates data against the SAP standards. 
- Send out the scorecard to users and get the approval for loading data into SAP Finally load the data in 

SAP using LSMW (Legacy system migration workbench). 
- Prepare test cases and log the same in HP Quality center.
